snippet: Australian Nick Kyrgios was involved in a fresh dispute after being accused of swearing at the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Australian Nick Kyrgios was involved in a fresh dispute after being accused of swearing at the BNP Paribas Open in California on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Kyrgios Involved in Swearing Row at Indian Wells
headline.main: Kyrgios Involved in Swearing Row at Indian Wells
